name: Commando Strike War: Terrorist
description:
Commando Strike War: Terrorist Shoot is the first-person shooter that all players like. Is the best of the latest shooting action games. If you want to fight in the real battlefield and modern warfare style, choose to install this game. Battlefield operations can provide you with land combat experience.
Features:
- The real 3D environment allows you to experience the excitement of war
- realistic fighting effect
- Simple and intuitive control
- a variety of addictive tasks
- Excellent urban environment
- amazing music and sound effects
- Realistic graphics
